titles.title: To amend title 11, United States Code, to provide an additional bankruptcy judge for the eastern district of California, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commercial and Administrative Law.

bill.summary: 5/20/2003--Introduced. Amends the Federal judicial code to provide an additional bankruptcy judge for the eastern district of California. Expresses the sense of Congress that bankruptcy judges should conduct bankruptcy proceedings on a daily basis in Bakersfield, California.
